articles.author: Kristina Sgueglia and Nicole Chavez, CNN
articles.title: NYPD makes arrest in assault of 61-year-old Asian man - CNN
articles.description: A man has been arrested in connection with the case of a 61-year-old Asian man who was attacked last week in New York, police said.
articles.content:
(CNN)A man has been arrested in connection with the case of a 61-year-old Asian man who was attacked last week in New York, police said.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Chloe Zhao's historic Academy Awards win all but ignored in China - ABC News
articles.description: Zhao is the first Asian woman to win Best Director for her film Nomadland, but in China the reaction has been tightly controlled, with praise removed from social media and supporters blocked from watching a livestream of the event.
articles.content:
The reaction to Chinese director Chloe Zhao's historic night at the Academy Awards has been surprisingly muted back home amid controversy over comments she made nearly a decade ago.
